DOCNAME: CASE OF BARTOK AND OTHERS v. ROMANIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)

CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the excessive length of criminal proceedings .
